methods.getAndRecord:
Return the result of allocationProcedure, run by the currently installed allocationRecorder.

Note: Java generics information - <RETURN_TYPE>

:param allocationProcedure: (java.util.function.Supplier<RETURN_TYPE>) - The allocation procedure to Supplier.get()
:return: (RETURN_TYPE) The result of allocationProcedure
methods.setAllocationRecorder:
Set an allocation recorder for this process' chunk pools.

:param allocationRecorder: (java.util.function.Function<java.util.function.Supplier<?>,?>) - The new allocation recorder, or null to install a default no-op recorder

text: Static callback holder for pooled chunk allocation.
